page.title: 18POWER (FROYLE/HOLYBOURNE)
page.content:
During the past few years oil detecting machines have been taken all over our area which has been carefully surveyed for underground oil deposits.
Although the oil to be mined is somewhat north of our block, on sites at Herriard and South Warnborough, the oil from these wells, when checked and treated, is to be piped underground across the area to an{oil storage {terminal}between Holybourne and Mill Court at Cuckoo's Corner on the dual carriage-way.
Work has commenced this year on the digging out of the land to install the oil tanks, make{access roads}for lorries to come and go and measures have been taken to screen the terminal from the road.
